Title: Extended User Journey (with dynamic titles)
Sentiment: Hear about site on social media | Visit website | Read reviews from other travellers
Opportunities: I don’t trust the reviews on the company’s website. I’m going to do my own research to validate whether this thing is legit.
Pain Points: Create a hashtag or public forum for anyone to contribute their thoughts, good, bad or otherwise

Sentiment: Preview survey before filling it out
Opportunities: The survey is displayed on the website to preview all the questions before committing to signing up for a trip

Pain Points: The order summary which included my survey responses was hard to read and verify what I had submitted

Sentiment: Email: Your trip is around the corner! Look for info soon
Opportunities: Tell all our friends about this crazy cool thing we are trying

Sentiment: One week before trip, receive email with weather, what to pack, where to go
Opportunities: Since we were travelling over halloween, they mentioned providing some fun ways to celebrate in costume in our mystery city
Pain Points: Pain point: The airport was a 3 hr drive away and since the flight was leaving very early, we got a hotel near the airport.

Sentiment: Day before, receive updated weather info | Receive envelope not to be opened until departure
Opportunities: If you try to peek through the back of the envelope, you can see a page that says ‘No Peeking’. Clever people!

Sentiment: Morning of, receive boarding passes for flight and open our envelope! Denver here we come! | Get an email with itineraries, hotel info, and activities
Opportunities: The information is printed on cardstock. They also created a Google map with all the recommended restaurants and attractions.
Pain Points: We were hoping to get some of the local faves in terms of restaurants and bars. Could be an opportunity to highlight previous traveller or local recommendations.

Sentiment: Follow-up survey and invitation to share photos and testimonials for the website
Opportunities: We had the same travel concierge from start to finish. Thank you!
